description:

Check out the new model for one of the Necrons’ most fearsome weapons – the C’tan Shard of the Nightbringer – at Warhammer Community: https://ow.ly/AcUr50WGfPo

author: Warhammer
description:
The gorgeous Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War – Definitive Edition is out now, featuring the original Dawn of War, all its expansions, and much more: https://ow.ly/5NZS50WGaaM

The Definitive Edition will have a 30% Veteran’s discount for Anniversary Edition Owners on both Steam and GOG.

author: Warhammer
description:
The mighty Saturnine Dreadnought is the biggest, baddest Dreadnought around! Although favoured by the Salamanders, this war machine is used by all the Legions. Check out this video to see Ollie paint his Saturnine Dreadnought in the colour scheme of the treacherous Iron Warriors.

Here’s a list of the paints we used in today’s video:

Base:
Abaddon Black
Averland Sunset
Khorne Red
Leadbelcher
Rhinox Hide
Runelord Brass

Layer:
Evil Sunz Scarlet
Fire Dragon Bright
Stormhost Silver
Tuskgor Fur
White Scar

Shade:
Agrax Earthshade
Druchii Violet
Nuln Oil

Technical:
Lahmian Medium

Tools:
M Base Brush
S Base Brush
S Layer Brush
M Dry Brush
L Shade Brush

If you enjoyed this and want to learn more, our YouTube channel has an array of beginner-friendly videos to get you started.

Follow for more Warhammer, more often:

- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/warhammerofficial/
- Threads: https://www.threads.net/@warhammerofficial
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WarhammerOfficial/
- Warh
title: How to Paint a Saturnine Dreadnought | Warhammer: The Horus Heresy
